one_reviews_text: It’s cute and fun. Me and my husband played it for hours.
Amazing game, except it is hard to find people to play - I wish the developers would set up events

Recomended by a friend - our daughters meet up to play together on this game during lockdown and it is straight up the highlight of her day. Brilliant games, quality production, good learning curve and hilarious sabotage mechanics - so many mor epeople need to buy this game!!

Lots of fun to do minigames like this in VR.  The puzzles are funny, creative and fun.  Some even give you a hell of a workout.  The physics work really well too.  My boyfriend and I play on our two headsets (we have two computers).  Glad we got it =)

This game manages to be silly and challenging at time the same time. Since there never seems to be other players online my son, nephews, and I came up with our own local multiplayer version. Sharing the headset isn't that big of deal since you can watch each others turn on the PC monitor (we do each player gets 3 turns in a row so we're not constantly passing the headset around) but not being able to play the full game in "solo" mode is annoying. I don't know why there hasn't been an option added to have a local multiplayer but if thar ever happens I would happily give 5 stars.
I have been waitinng for a week and can't get into a game. There is no one playing this game. I have only been able to play not even a full game because everyone left.

Update: Thanks for the Dev response, I have found the box under the table and it works great. It also allows for seated play, which is nice.

Old Review: This is a great game concept, and I would love to play it with my daughter and her friends, however the lack of a height adjustment makes that impossible.  I've had this game for over year now and that simple omission has gotten of the way of playing nearly every time. Devs, don't miss out on the younger market here (especially if you plan on bringing this to the Quest).
review_feedback: UPdate: Glad you found it and thanks for adjusting your review, enjoy! 1st Update: Hey there - fear not, you *can* play with your daughter! In September 2017 we added the Minor Feature UPdate, which added a virtual height boost when you pull the box out from underneath the main game table and stand in place on top of it ^_^

one_reviews_text: Great fun to play. Very funny and well executed mini-games (16) - not too easy, with good replay value. Very entertaining with friends (taking turns locally). Very funny design. It feels like being in a japanase game show! Professional production value. This is really a gem of a game!
every time i try to start it says it's crashed ive tried everything i can but still no start. so i cant play the game and i was told its realy good
review_feedback: Hi there - really sorry to hear this - can you dig out the output log file from your game installation directory and email it over to info[at]locodojogame[dot]com and we'll take a look for you. **EDIT** Feb 10th, we still haven't received your file, we can't help you if we can't see why it's crashing for you :(

one_reviews_text: Amazing party game, multiplayer mode is super entertaining!
This game is basically Mario Party in VR.  It is a lot of fun playing with friends and the competition is real. :-)
this is a funny and surprisingly challenging and fun game, it would be perfect for playing with friends but alas, has been said, lacks local multiplayer. it's really a shame!

Nobody plays this.

Like every Rift game I buy, this is dead. Rift sucks, no online community. 

Nice job segregating the online community into the proprietary "Rift" community.

Wasting time and money trying to search for one other person in the whole world to play this, but day after day I am loading up and nothing comes.

Rift is a stupid gimmick.
review_feedback: Our game uses cloud-based servers so there is cross-platform play between Oculus Store and Steam users, the hardware is irrelevant. There are many reddit threads and forum posts with Loco Dojo players looking for games to join in with.

review_title: Amazing game but is missing hot seat
one_reviews_text: Bought the game as it seemed perfect for a VR party evening. The mini games are absolutly amazing. However, there is no local multiplayer so you will need to keep score on paper. This is by far my most played VR game and I hope there will one day be a sequel.
The Game is good but there is no online community which makes me want a refund.

I play a lot of games and never leave reviews for them no matter how good or bad they are but this game....THIS GAME HERE...IS AN AWESOME GAME!  There are 16 different mini games that are all a blast to play and easy to learn but hard to master. Solo play is a fun.  One of the mini games gives you sausage nunchucks to beat off flying bats with. i mean what else could you really ask for

This is one of my favorite games!  Lots of mini-games to play - by yourself or with friends.  I haven't quite figured out how to win some of them, but hopefully with time...  I wish there were more VR games like this one that I go back to time and again.

Graphics look very sharp for this gen of VR games. It has something like 16 minigames which are fun. some minigames are almost impossible, but always humorous. Still need to try the multiplayer. And I rate games that include multiplayer usually higher. Might get boring arfter awhile though.
I am really suprised. Sometimes there is a game which catches you by suprise. This is one of those, its a great party game. Even with a few people and one Rift you can have great fun.

review_title: Great game, but be ready to play alone
one_reviews_text: First thing first, sadly its really hard to find online games and creating games leads to a lot of time twiddling your thumbs.  But the game is great, would be amazing if a future update had the ability to do a local game for just high scores, but I understand its really meant for 4 players online.  Hopefully the community continues to grow, cuz this game is really fun.
review_feedback: Hey Luna, have you tried the Solo Challenge mode?

one_reviews_text:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ARLY0TQcc4k
Wow..... even in single player I was surprised at the amount of depth this game offers. I don't think I've laughed so much in a VR game and I can imagine this would be a blast with friends.
This game is a blast, and people need to have this in their life.  The theme song is etched into my brain. Great work devs!
review_feedback: Thank you - we can't get it out of our heads either, a real earworm!

one_reviews_text: like most of the reviews said, this is actually a fun game but it seems barren. Anyone that wants to play - add me on Oculus!

review_title: It is not an international product
one_reviews_text:
It is not an international product, It's only in English.
You can not play online
review_feedback: The Oculus Store page clearly lists the languages supported for all titles - correct in this case, English is the only provided language in-game for audio and text. Online play is supported through the ability to join games or host your own public or private lobbies

one_reviews_text: I have played solo, wich its good to see some of the games and start to know the playstyle, but this game is ment to be played with more people and i wasnt able to find any.
If you like party games like Mario Party, then this is definitely for you.  Glad to see games like this on the Rift!
The world needs to be playing this game. Next level party game experience.
playing solo is still alot of fun
the game is super fun but there is hardly any online games
Cant find anyone but still fun to play by myself for an hour
review_feedback: Try creating a room for randoms to join, it's all hosted in the cloud so won't affect your bandwidth

review_title: not super easy, but fun & beautiful
one_reviews_text: took a while to actually figuring out how to score. but its a cool party game with sweet graphics
I cant find anyone to join me or i cant find anyone to  join.
review_feedback: Try creating a room for randoms to join, it's all hosted in the cloud so won't affect your bandwidth - or whilst waiting, hone your skills in the Solo Challenge mode
